Text: What seems to be the matter sir?
Bah! I was taking a leisurely stroll from my home up north through that crevice by the tuck shop...
... But by the time I was making my way back, the dang thing already littered up with monsters!
Old men such as myself don't bring this one out lightly, but BAH HUMBUG!
And I'll say it again dammit: BAH HUMBUG!!!
